Hello,

I've got a problem running JFCUnit test cases using text test runner: JVM is
not shut down because of the JRE bug. GUI test runners are not quite
acceptable for me. Another option is to use Ant's junit task, but it's not
that interactive. Would it be possible to have an option in text test runner
to exit JVM after the test? Any better ideas?

Thanks,

--oleg
subject: Shutting down JVM
